txt.en: 'Master gone... Must return to caves.'
Târgrat the Proud has been angered
You have found the encampment of Târgrat the Proud
You are leaving the encampment of Târgrat the Proud

An arrogant Orc named Târgrat holds great sway over many of his followers, and it would be best if he were removed from his post. Unfortunately, he commands a powerful troll bodyguard. Maenhador believes that the Orc's pride may be his weak point, if you can find some way to exploit it.
Defeated Târgrat the Proud
'You may have slain my bodyguard, but you shall not catch me so easily!'

'Our scouts report a particularly large and loud Orc by the name of Târgrat who commands many of the Orcs in Fanuidhol. He is a preening fool by all accounts, but dangerous nonetheless, particularly due to the huge troll who acts as his bodyguard.

'Nevertheless, pride goes before a fall, as they say, and I suspect that his pride is indeed his greatest weakness. If you were to <rgb=#FF0000>mock</rgb> him before his followers, he may well lose his composure and make a deadly mistake.

'This Orc can be found in the north-west reaches of Fanuidhol, in the encampment of Nardur-stazg.'

Târgrat is at Nardur-stazg in Fanuidhol, north-west of Talan Fanuidhol.\n\nIn order to defeat Târgrat, despite the protection of his troll bodyguard, Maenhador has suggested that you try <rgb=#FF0000>mock</rgb>ing him before his underlings.
'Welcome back! How went your battle against Târgrat? Pride and vanity are ever the weakness of fools.'

Târgrat is at Nardur-stazg in Fanuidhol, north-west of Talan Fanuidhol.\n\nIn his rage over your insults, Târgrat the Proud has forsaken the protection of his bodyguard to pursue you personally. You must defeat him in battle.
Maenhador is at Talan Fanuidhol, south-east of Nardur-stazg.\n\nYou should return to Maenhador with tidings of your victory against Târgrat.
'Târgrat is a proud and arrogant creature...he will not abide your mockery.'
'Târgrat is a proud and arrogant creature...he will not abide your mockery.'
'How did your quest go, [placeholder]?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Mock</rgb> Târgrat the Proud
'Such is the fate of over-proud fools....'
Find Târgrat's encampment
Defeat Târgrat the Proud
Talk to Maenhador at Talan Fanuidhol
Mockery
'You have dared to insult me before my underlings, and so you shall die by my hands alone!'
